taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family rosaceae;tribe rubeae;genus rubus;subgenus eubatus;section arguti;species praepes;

treatment.description: Erect, with spreading summit; terete canes up to 2 m. high, with scattered acicular-subulate prickles; primocane-leaves 5; terminal leaflet rhombic-ovate, irregularly lobulate-dentate, long-petiolulate; corymbs with 2 or 3 rather small basal bracts, most of the pedicels subtended by tiny bractlets; corolla about 2 cm. broad.
